title: Job Security
longDescription: Protecting your professional identity and work-related accounts is crucial for both personal and organizational security.

items.title: Work-personal separation
items.description: Maintain separation between work and personal accounts
items.details: Use separate devices, emails, and accounts for work and personal matters when possible.

items.title: LinkedIn security
items.details: Enable 2FA on LinkedIn and other professional networks. Be cautious of connection requests from unknown individuals.

items.title: Resume/CV privacy
items.details: Avoid including detailed personal information like home address and birthdate on publicly shared resumes.
